properties.description: The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: arch
properties.description: • arch - (Required) The architecture of the distro. Valid options are: i386, x86_64, ia64, ppc, ppc64, s390, arm.

properties.name: breed
properties.description: • breed - (Required) The "breed" of distribution. Valid options are: redhat, fedora, centos, scientific linux, suse, debian, and ubuntu. These choices may vary depending on the version of Cobbler in use.

properties.name: boot_files
properties.description: • boot_files - (Optional) Files copied into tftpboot beyond the kernel/initrd.

properties.name: comment
properties.description: • comment - (Optional) Free form text description.

properties.name: fetchable_files
properties.description: • fetchable_files - (Optional) Templates for tftp or wget.

properties.name: kernel
properties.description: • kernel - (Required) Absolute path to kernel on filesystem. This must already exist prior to creating the distro.

properties.name: kernel_options
properties.description: • kernel_options - (Optional) Kernel options to use with the kernel.

properties.name: kernel_options_post
properties.description: • kernel_options_post - (Optional) Post install Kernel options to use with the kernel after installation.

properties.name: initrd
properties.description: • initrd - (Required) Absolute path to initrd on filesystem. This must already exist prior to creating the distro.

properties.name: mgmt_classes
properties.description: • mgmt_classes - (Optional) Management classes for external config management.

properties.name: name
properties.description: • name - (Required) A name for the distro.

properties.name: os_version
properties.description: • os_version - (Required) The version of the distro you are creating. This varies with the version of Cobbler you are using. An updated signature list may need to be obtained in order to support a newer version. Example: trusty.

properties.name: owners
properties.description: • owners - (Optional) Owners list for authz_ownership.

properties.name: redhat_management_key
properties.description: • redhat_management_key - (Optional) Red Hat Management key.

properties.name: redhat_management_server
properties.description: • redhat_management_server - (Optional) Red Hat Management server.

properties.name: template_files
properties.description: • template_files - (Optional) File mappings for built-in config management.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: body
properties.description: • body - (Required) The body of the kickstart file.

properties.name: name
properties.description: • name - (Required) The name of the kickstart file. This must be the full path, including /var/lib/cobbler/kickstarts.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: apt_components
properties.description: • apt_components - (Optional) List of Apt components such as main, restricted, universe. Applicable to apt breeds only.

properties.name: apt_dists
properties.description: • apt_dists - (Optional) List of Apt distribution names such as trusty, trusty-updates. Applicable to apt breeds only.

properties.name: arch
properties.description: • arch - (Optional) The architecture of the repo. Valid options are: i386, x86_64, ia64, ppc, ppc64, s390, arm.

properties.name: breed
properties.description: • breed - (Required) The "breed" of distribution. Valid options are: rsync, rhn, yum, apt, and wget. These choices may vary depending on the version of Cobbler in use.

properties.name: comment
properties.description: • comment - (Optional) Free form text description.

properties.name: createrepo_flags
properties.description: • createrepo_flags - (Optional) Flags to use with createrepo.

properties.name: environment
properties.description: • environment - (Optional) Environment variables to use during repo command execution.

properties.name: keep_updated
properties.description: • keep_updated - (Optional) Update the repo upon Cobbler sync. Valid values are true or false.

properties.name: mirror
properties.description: • mirror - (Required) Address of the repo to mirror.

properties.name: mirror_locally
properties.description: • mirror_locally - (Required) Whether to copy the files locally or just references to the external files. Valid values are true or false.

properties.name: name
properties.description: • name - (Required) A name for the repo.

properties.name: owners
properties.description: • owners - (Optional) List of Owners for authz_ownership.

properties.name: proxy
properties.description: • proxy - (Optional) Proxy to use for downloading the repo. This argument does not work on older versions of Cobbler.

properties.name: rpm_list
properties.description: • rpm_list - (Optional) List of specific RPMs to mirror.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: boot_files
properties.description: • boot_files - (Optional) Files copied into tftpboot beyond the kernel/initrd.

properties.name: comment
properties.description: • comment - (Optional) Free form text description.

properties.name: parent
properties.description: • parent - (Optional) The parent this profile inherits settings from.

properties.name: server
properties.description: • server - (Optional) The server-override for the profile.

properties.name: distro
properties.description: • distro - (Optional) Parent distribution.

properties.name: enable_gpxe
properties.description: • enable_gpxe - (Optional) Use gPXE instead of PXELINUX for advanced booting options.

properties.name: enable_menu
properties.description: • enable_menu - (Optional) Enable a boot menu.

properties.name: fetchable_files
properties.description: • fetchable_files - (Optional) Templates for tftp or wget.

properties.name: kernel_options
properties.description: • kernel_options - (Optional) Kernel options for the profile.

properties.name: kernel_options_post
properties.description: • kernel_options_post - (Optional) Post install kernel options.

properties.name: kickstart
properties.description: • kickstart - (Optional) The kickstart file to use.

properties.name: ks_meta
properties.description: • ks_meta - (Optional) Kickstart metadata.

properties.name: mgmt_classes
properties.description: • mgmt_classes - (Optional) For external configuration management.

properties.name: mgmt_parameters
properties.description: • mgmt_parameters - (Optional) Parameters which will be handed to your management application (Must be a valid YAML dictionary).

properties.name: name_servers_search
properties.description: • name_servers_search - (Optional) Name server search settings.

properties.name: name_servers
properties.description: • name_servers - (Optional) Name servers.

properties.name: name
properties.description: • name - (Required) The name of the profile.

properties.name: owners
properties.description: • owners - (Optional) Owners list for authz_ownership.

properties.name: proxy
properties.description: • proxy - (Optional) Proxy URL.

properties.name: redhat_management_key
properties.description: • redhat_management_key - (Optional) Red Hat Management Key.

properties.name: redhat_management_server
properties.description: • redhat_management_server - (Optional) RedHat Management Server.

properties.name: repos
properties.description: • repos - (Optional) Repos to auto-assign to this profile.

properties.name: template_files
properties.description: • template_files - (Optional) File mappings for built-in config management.

properties.name: template_remote_kickstarts
properties.description: • template_remote_kickstarts - (Optional) remote kickstart templates.

properties.name: virt_auto_boot
properties.description: • virt_auto_boot - (Optional) Auto boot virtual machines.

properties.name: virt_bridge
properties.description: • virt_bridge - (Optional) The bridge for virtual machines.

properties.name: virt_cpus
properties.description: • virt_cpus - (Optional) The number of virtual CPUs.

properties.name: virt_file_size
properties.description: • virt_file_size - (Optional) The virtual machine file size.

properties.name: virt_path
properties.description: • virt_path - (Optional) The virtual machine path.

properties.name: virt_ram
properties.description: • virt_ram - (Optional) The amount of RAM for the virtual machine.

properties.name: virt_type
properties.description: • virt_type - (Optional) The type of virtual machine. Valid options are: xenpv, xenfv, qemu, kvm, vmware, openvz.

properties.name: virt_disk_driver
properties.description: • virt_disk_driver - (Optional) The virtual machine disk driver.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: body
properties.description: • body - (Required) The body of the snippet.

properties.name: name
properties.description: • name - (Required) The name of the snippet. This must be the full path, including /var/lib/cobbler/snippets.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: boot_files
properties.description: • boot_files - (Optional) TFTP boot files copied into tftpboot.

properties.name: comment
properties.description: • comment - (Optional) Free form text description

properties.name: enable_gpxe
properties.description: • enable_gpxe - (Optional) Use gPXE instead of PXELINUX.

properties.name: fetchable_files
properties.description: • fetchable_files - (Optional) Templates for tftp or wget.

properties.name: gateway
properties.description: • gateway - (Optional) Network gateway.

properties.name: hostname
properties.description: • hostname - (Optional) Hostname of the system.

properties.name: image
properties.description: • image - (Optional) Parent image (if no profile is used).

properties.name: interface
properties.description: • interface - (Optional)

properties.name: ipv6_default_device
properties.description: • ipv6_default_device - (Optional) IPv6 default device.

properties.name: kernel_options
properties.description: • kernel_options - (Optional) Kernel options. ex: selinux=permissive.

properties.name: kernel_options_post
properties.description: • kernel_options_post - (Optional) Kernel options (post install).

properties.name: kickstart
properties.description: • kickstart - (Optional) Path to kickstart template.

properties.name: ks_meta
properties.description: • ks_meta - (Optional) Kickstart metadata.

properties.name: ldap_enabled
properties.description: • ldap_enabled - (Optional) Configure LDAP at next config update.

properties.name: ldap_type
properties.description: • ldap_type - (Optional) LDAP management type.

properties.name: mgmt_classes
properties.description: • mgmt_classes - (Optional) Management classes for external config management.

properties.name: mgmt_parameters
properties.description: • mgmt_parameters - (Optional) Parameters which will be handed to your management application. Must be a valid YAML dictionary.

properties.name: monit_enabled
properties.description: • monit_enabled - (Optional) Configure monit on this machine at next config update.

properties.name: name_servers_search
properties.description: • name_servers_search - (Optional) Name servers search path.

properties.name: name_servers
properties.description: • name_servers - (Optional) Name servers.

properties.name: name
properties.description: • name - (Required) The name of the system.

properties.name: netboot_enabled
properties.description: • netboot_enabled - (Optional) (re)Install this machine at next boot.

properties.name: owners
properties.description: • owners - (Optional) Owners list for authz_ownership.

properties.name: power_address
properties.description: • power_address - (Optional) Power management address.

properties.name: power_id
properties.description: • power_id - (Optional) Usually a plug number or blade name if power type requires it.

properties.name: power_pass
properties.description: • power_pass - (Optional) Power management password.

properties.name: power_type
properties.description: • power_type - (Optional) Power management type.

properties.name: power_user
properties.description: • power_user - (Optional) Power management user.

properties.name: profile
properties.description: • profile - (Required) Parent profile.

properties.name: proxy
properties.description: • proxy - (Optional) Proxy URL.

properties.name: redhat_management_key
properties.description: • redhat_management_key - (Optional) Red Hat management key.

properties.name: redhat_management_server
properties.description: • redhat_management_server - (Optional) Red Hat management server.

properties.name: status
properties.description: • status - (Optional) System status (development, testing, acceptance, production).

properties.name: template_files
properties.description: • template_files - (Optional) File mappings for built-in configuration management.

properties.name: template_remote_kickstarts
properties.description: • template_remote_kickstarts - (Optional) template remote kickstarts.

properties.name: virt_auto_boot
properties.description: • virt_auto_boot - (Optional) Auto boot the VM.

properties.name: virt_cpus
properties.description: • virt_cpus - (Optional) Number of virtual CPUs in the VM.

properties.name: virt_disk_driver
properties.description: • virt_disk_driver - (Optional) The on-disk format for the virtualization disk.

properties.name: virt_file_size
properties.description: • virt_file_size - (Optional) Virt file size.

properties.name: virt_path
properties.description: • virt_path - (Optional) Path to the VM.

properties.name: virt_pxe_boot
properties.description: • virt_pxe_boot - (Optional) Use PXE to build this VM?

properties.name: virt_ram
properties.description: • virt_ram - (Optional) The amount of RAM for the VM.

properties.name: virt_type
properties.description: • virt_type - (Optional) Virtualization technology to use: xenpv, xenfv, qemu, kvm, vmware, openvz.
The interface block supports:

properties.name: name
properties.description: • name - (Required) The device name of the interface. ex: eth0.

properties.name: cnames
properties.description: • cnames - (Optional) Canonical name records.

properties.name: dhcp_tag
properties.description: • dhcp_tag - (Optional) DHCP tag.

properties.name: dns_name
properties.description: • dns_name - (Optional) DNS name.

properties.name: bonding_opts
properties.description: • bonding_opts - (Optional) Options for bonded interfaces.

properties.name: bridge_opts
properties.description: • bridge_opts - (Optional) Options for bridge interfaces.

properties.name: gateway
properties.description: • gateway - (Optional) Per-interface gateway.

properties.name: interface_type
properties.description: • interface_type - (Optional) The type of interface: na, master, slave, bond, bond_slave, bridge, bridge_slave, bonded_bridge_slave.

properties.name: interface_master
properties.description: • interface_master - (Optional) The master interface when slave.

properties.name: ip_address
properties.description: • ip_address - (Optional) The IP address of the interface.

properties.name: ipv6_address
properties.description: • ipv6_address - (Optional) The IPv6 address of the interface.

properties.name: ipv6_mtu
properties.description: • ipv6_mtu - (Optional) The MTU of the IPv6 address.

properties.name: ipv6_static_routes
properties.description: • ipv6_static_routes - (Optional) Static routes for the IPv6 interface.

properties.name: ipv6_default_gateway
properties.description: • ipv6_default_gateway - (Optional) The default gateawy for the IPv6 address / interface.

properties.name: mac_address
properties.description: • mac_address - (Optional) The MAC address of the interface.

properties.name: management
properties.description: • management - (Optional) Whether this interface is a management interface.

properties.name: netmask
properties.description: • netmask - (Optional) The IPv4 netmask of the interface.

properties.name: static
properties.description: • static - (Optional) Whether the interface should be static or DHCP.

properties.name: static_routes
properties.description: • static_routes - (Optional) Static routes for the interface.

properties.name: virt_bridge
properties.description: • virt_bridge - (Optional) The virtual bridge to attach to.
